it.polimi.se2018.controller.states

Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.states.ModelFacade

  • public class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a facade of the model passed as parameter to the State's methods. It provides all and only the model's methods that could by used while handling connections and disconnections, without giving an explicit reference to the model.
    Author:
    Pietro Ghiglio
